location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paper.Dimensions: 460 x 657, on sheet 650 x 770mm.

mods.abstract: The map shows Yemen and the surrounding region, including parts of French Somaliland [Djibouti]. The map, which was produced by the War Office, includes highlighted regions that are described as showing the 'present limits of Zeidi penetrations'. The topographical details and measurements of scale also appear in French.
